ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Standard and good intro Korean class!
basic understanding in Korean
Learned far more than I expected for one semester
By taking this course, I was able to gain an understanding of the Korean language and basic grammar skills.
I developed a basic understanding of the Korean language as well as a new appreciation for different aspects of Korean culture.
pretty good
A solid foundation in the Korean language.
korean grammar, basic communication
I learned basic characters and grammars of Korean. Now I can have some simple Korean conversations.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Could be harder and more challenged
Amazing professor, most of homework was actually useful practice
I absolutely loved the course and the instructor. He was so kind and attentive to students needs.
A weakness could be the textbook/workbook homework being a bit hard to understand (the audio recordings) but otherwise it was extremely interactive, informative and taught with vigor and life!

quite structured 
There could be more group work and practice groups.
It was well-paced, not too intense, whilst still allowing for lots to be learned.
if the required vocab could be address more clearly
The textbook was not very helpful because there wasnt enough English. The listening comprehension was too difficult in the second half of the course so much so that it wasnt helpful for learning.

Overall the class is incredible. I really enjoyed it. Our teacher is really amiable and helpful. The atmosphere of our class is also great. One thing that can be improved is the Open Your Ears Wide homework which contains many words we havent learned yet. Maybe we can have more suitable listening homework.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments:
yes, very fun class to take 
Nice professor and peers
Yes amazing professor class was a lot of fun
Yes, I felt the class was easy to follow, and I always felt comfortable asking any questions I had in the class.

I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to learn the Korean language because this provides a very solid foundation for learning the language. The teacher is also amazing and facilitates great learning.
Yes
Yes, it's not too difficult but you definitely still learn a lot.
Yes absolutely, the language is difficult to learn but the course is organized in a way that makes it very welcoming and manageable.
would recommend for korean learner
Yes. This is a wonderful class for Korean beginners. The workload is acceptable and you can learn Korean happily.
